config.testName: Changes to an opportunity's attendance (via AttendeeAttendedSimulateAction) should update the Order Feed.
config.testDescription: After B, invoke an `AttendeeAttendedSimulateAction`. This should create an update in the Order Feed with the OrderItem's orderItemStatus changed to `https://openactive.io/CustomerAttended`
